constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 197 (Friday, November 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JACKSON:
H.R. 5954.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H6247]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1304 4th Avenue in Canyon, Texas, as the "Gary James Fletcher Post Office Building".
